message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to invest in this high-quality item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $10,000.
Thanks Alice, I appreciate the offer. However, $10,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product.

I understand your concerns, Bob, but I'm still looking to get a better price for my product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $9,500. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really benefit from owning this product.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $9,500 is still a bit too high.  I'm willing to go to $9,000.  That's a fair price for both of us.

I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9,000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $9,250. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll be happy with the price.
